text: Dona Augusta is a village on São Tomé Island in São Tomé and Príncipe. Its population is 166 (2012 census).2012 detailed census São Tomé e Príncipe, Instituto Nacional de Estatística Dona Augusta is located 4 km southwest of São João dos Angolares and 1 km northeast of Praia Pesqueira. ==Population history== ==References== Category:Populated places in Caué District
title: Dona Augusta, São Tomé and Príncipe
